about_the_game:
Thank you for trying out this game!

As this is still a Demo version, there might be bugs, incomplete UI and art effects, temporary game text, or imbalanced values.

In this Demo version, you will be able to experience the complete content of "Tire 1 Dungeon".

Please note: When the official version is released, save files from the Demo will no longer be usable. Additionally, content from the Demo may change in the official version.

If you encounter any issues or have any feedback or suggestions while playing, we highly encourage you to let the developers know.

------ Join the official community ------

Discord: EtHyFH9H

QQ: 1028363773

Have fun playing! Thank you.
detailed_description:
Thank you for trying out this game!

As this is still a Demo version, there might be bugs, incomplete UI and art effects, temporary game text, or imbalanced values.

In this Demo version, you will be able to experience the complete content of "Tire 1 Dungeon".

Please note: When the official version is released, save files from the Demo will no longer be usable. Additionally, content from the Demo may change in the official version.

If you encounter any issues or have any feedback or suggestions while playing, we highly encourage you to let the developers know.

name: Villages & Dungeons Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A hardcore roguelike card game where deck-building strategies are at the core of everything! With a vast array of cards, random dungeons, a wealth of encounter events, and diverse enemies, it awaits your exploration and challenge.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
